TopicTitle: [Solved]90% chance that I can't edit posts in Chrome

Articles.Content:
When I am using Google Chrome, if I try editing a post, it will open the edit windows, but in the text field there would just be an blank, white space. Also if I try writing something ona thread, I get the same thing too. I can bypass that by clicking "advanced mode", however that doesn't work with editing, which is very annoying.

IE works fine though, please look into this.

Edited April 28, 2014 by iDan122

Sounds like you need to clear your cache and do a hard-refresh (Ctrl+F5, or Shift+Click on the refresh button). This can happen if Chrome fails to load the interface once and then stores an incomplete version of the code in cache.
Thanks! Ctrl+F5 is now my fav combination
